= creators =
 field: stringlist '''creators''' (Read-only)

The '''creators''' field contains names of creators who contributed to a zone.

== Description ==
The creators field is a read-only property of zone units that returns a stringlist containing the names of creators who contributed to that zone. This provides information about the authors or builders responsible for the zone's content and design.

== Field Access ==
{| class="wikitable"
! Access !! Type !! Description
|-
| zone.creators || stringlist || The list of creator names
|}

== Availability ==
This field is available on the following unit types:
* UNIT_ST_ROOM (Room with zone properties)

== Examples ==
=== Basic Creator Display ===
 dilbegin show_creators();
 var
    zone : unitptr;
    creator_list : stringlist;
 code
 {
    zone := self.outside;
    
    if (zone and zone.creators) {
       act("Zone creators:", A_ALWAYS, self, null, null, TO_CHAR);
       
       // Display each creator
       foreach (creator_name in zone.creators) {
          act("  " + creator_name, A_ALWAYS, self, null, null, TO_CHAR);
       }
    } else {
       act("No creator information available for this zone.", A_ALWAYS, self, null, null, TO_CHAR);
    }
    quit;
 } dilend

=== Zone Information Command ===
 dilbegin zone_info();
 var
    current_zone : unitptr;
    creator_count : integer;
 code
 {
    current_zone := self.outside;
    
    if (current_zone and current_zone.creators) {
       creator_count := length(current_zone.creators);
       act("Zone: " + current_zone.zoneidx, A_ALWAYS, self, null, null, TO_CHAR);
       act("Total creators: " + itoa(creator_count), A_ALWAYS, self, null, null, TO_CHAR);
       
       // Display each creator
       foreach (creator_name in current_zone.creators) {
          act("  Creator: " + creator_name, A_ALWAYS, self, null, null, TO_CHAR);
       }
    } else {
       act("No creator information available.", A_ALWAYS, self, null, null, TO_CHAR);
    }
    quit;
 } dilend

=== Creator Search ===
 dilbegin find_zone_creators(zone_name : string);
 var
    zone_ptr : zoneptr;
    found_creators : stringlist;
 code
 {
    zone_ptr := zhead();
    
    while (zone_ptr) {
       if (zone_ptr.name == zone_name) {
          found_creators := zone_ptr.creators;
          break;
       }
       zone_ptr := zone_ptr.next;
    }
    
    if (found_creators) {
       act("Creators of zone '" + zone_name + "':", A_ALWAYS, self, null, null, TO_CHAR);
       foreach (creator_name in found_creators) {
          act("  " + creator_name, A_ALWAYS, self, null, null, TO_CHAR);
       }
    } else {
       act("Zone '" + zone_name + "' not found or has no creator information.", 
          A_ALWAYS, self, null, null, TO_CHAR);
    }
    quit;
 } dilend

=== Help System Integration ===
 dilbegin help_creators();
 var
    zone : unitptr;
    help_text : string;
 code
 {
    zone := self.outside;
    
    if (zone and zone.creators) {
       help_text := "This zone was created by: ";
       
       // Format creator list nicely
       if (length(zone.creators) == 1) {
          help_text := help_text + zone.creators.[0];
       } else {
          help_text := help_text + zone.creators.[0];
          foreach (i := 1; i < length(zone.creators); i := i + 1) {
             if (i == length(zone.creators)) {
                help_text := help_text + " and " + zone.creators.[i];
             } else {
                help_text := help_text + ", " + zone.creators.[i];
             }
          }
       }
       
       sendtext(help_text, self);
    } else {
       sendtext("No creator information available for this zone.", self);
    }
    quit;
 } dilend

== Usage Notes ==
* Only available on zone units (UNIT_ST_ROOM with zone properties)
* Returns a stringlist containing creator names
* The field is read-only and cannot be modified through DIL
* Used for help systems, zone information displays, and credit attribution
* Creator information is typically stored in zone data and loaded when zone is initialized
* Useful for tracking zone authorship and building contributions

== Error Handling ==
The field performs validation:
* '''Zone validation''' - Ensures unit is a zone with properties
* '''Type validation''' - Returns fail if unit is not a valid zone type
* '''List validation''' - Ensures stringlist is properly formatted
